Title: Add user accounts, roles and personal cabinet

Description:
Introduce user authentication, profiles and role-based personal cabinets for parents and providers. Users should be able to manage profile info, view their applications and children (parents), and manage drafts and published activities (providers).

Acceptance criteria:
- Auth: simple email/password auth or OAuth (configurable), session or token-based.
- User model with roles: `parent`, `provider`, `admin`.
- Personal cabinet pages for parents and providers with appropriate CRUD operations.

Labels: enhancement, backend, frontend, auth
Estimate: L
